King George's Chief Councillor,1,1: King George's Chief Councillor: 'Tis the fifth time that the princess was kidnapped! Methinks a great mystery surrounds her. Oh mighty hero, thou art the last hope of our land and ... the 5689th person to accept his majesty's missions.
King George's Chief Councillor,1,2: King George's Chief Councillor: Farewell, mighty hero.
